meanings.definition: The quality of being exceptional or extraordinary.
meanings.sent1: Her exceptionalnesses in academics earned her a scholarship.
meanings.sent2: The team's exceptionalnesses were recognized with a trophy.
meanings.sent3: His exceptionalnesses in baking cookies made him the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The exceptionalnesses of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.
meanings.sent5: The exceptionalnesses of the diamond sparkled in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Instances of being exceptional or extraordinary.
meanings.sent1: The museum showcased many exceptionalnesses from different eras.
meanings.sent2: The book highlighted various exceptionalnesses of human resilience.
meanings.sent3: The exceptionalnesses of the clown's tricks left the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: The exceptionalnesses of nature's beauty never cease to amaze me.
meanings.sent5: The exceptionalnesses of the orchestra's performance brought tears to my eyes.
